Package: io.vertx.ext.metrics

[Java] Class MetricsServiceOptions

      • io.vertx.ext.metrics.MetricsServiceOptions

      • Vert.x metrics service configuration.

        Authors:
        Julien Viet

        • Field Summary

            Fields 
            Modifiers Name Description
            static boolean  DEFAULT_JMX_ENABLED The default value of JMX enabled = false
            static boolean  DEFAULT_METRICS_ENABLED The default value of metrics enabled false

        • Constructor Summary

            Constructors 
            Constructor and description
            MetricsServiceOptions ()
            Default constructor
            MetricsServiceOptions (MetricsServiceOptions other)
            Copy constructor
            MetricsServiceOptions (JsonObject json)
            Create an instance from a io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject

        • Methods Summary

            Methods 
            Type Name and description
            String getJmxDomain()
            Get the JMX domain to use when JMX metrics are enabled.
            String getName()
            An optional name used by the metrics implementation for namespacing or registering the metrics.
            boolean isEnabled()
            Will metrics be enabled on the Vert.x instance?
            boolean isJmxEnabled()
            Will JMX be enabled on the Vert.x instance?
            MetricsServiceOptions setEnabled(boolean enable)
            Set whether metrics will be enabled on the Vert.x instance.
            MetricsServiceOptions setJmxDomain(String jmxDomain)
            Set the JMX domain to use when JMX metrics are enabled.
            MetricsServiceOptions setJmxEnabled(boolean jmxEnabled)
            Set whether JMX will be enabled on the Vert.x instance.
            MetricsServiceOptions setName(String name)
            Set the name used by the metrics implementation for namespacing or registering the metrics.

            The default value of JMX enabled = false

        • Method Detail

          • public String getJmxDomain()

            Get the JMX domain to use when JMX metrics are enabled.

            Returns:
            the JMX domain

          • public String getName()

            An optional name used by the metrics implementation for namespacing or registering the metrics.

            Returns:
            the metrics name

          • public boolean isEnabled()

            Will metrics be enabled on the Vert.x instance?

            Returns:
            true if enabled, false if not.

          • public boolean isJmxEnabled()

            Will JMX be enabled on the Vert.x instance?

            Returns:
            true if enabled, false if not.

          • public MetricsServiceOptions setEnabled(boolean enable)

            Set whether metrics will be enabled on the Vert.x instance.

            Returns:
            a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
            Parameters:
            enable - true if metrics enabled, or false if not.

          • public MetricsServiceOptions setJmxDomain(String jmxDomain)

            Set the JMX domain to use when JMX metrics are enabled.

            Returns:
            a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
            Parameters:
            jmxDomain - the JMX domain

          • public MetricsServiceOptions setJmxEnabled(boolean jmxEnabled)

            Set whether JMX will be enabled on the Vert.x instance.

            Returns:
            a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
            Parameters:
            jmxEnabled - true if JMX enabled, or false if not.

          • public MetricsServiceOptions setName(String name)

            Set the name used by the metrics implementation for namespacing or registering the metrics.

            Returns:
            a reference to this, so the API can be used fluently
            Parameters:
            name - the name
